Name: Daiquiri No. 5 (Pink Daiquiri)
Ingredients: 50 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: A Daiquiri sweetened with pomegranate syrup and a splash of maraschino. (Classically blended rather than shaken.
History: Created by Constantino "Constante" Ribalaïgua Vert, who owned and bartended at Havana's famous El Floridita from 1918 to 1952. The Daiquiri No. 5, also known as the Pink Daiquiri due to its hue, appears in the 1939 edition of his bar's Cocktails Bar La Florida cocktail menu book.
Nutrition: One serving of Daiquiri No. 5 (Pink Daiquiri) contains 155 calories
